title: Super Rugby summaries
text: March 16, 2018 / 11:21 AM / Updated 9 hours ago Super Rugby summaries Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Mar 16 (OPTA) - summaries from the Super Rugby matches on Friday Chiefs (14) 41 Tries: Faauli (8), Retallick (35,55), Brown (42), Alaimalo (73), Lienert-Brown (80) Conversions: McKenzie (9,37,44,82) Penalties: McKenzie (62) Bulls (28) 28 Tries: Gelant (2), Rossouw (15,22), Pollard (38) Conversions: Pollard (4,15,23,39) Yellow cards: Van Vuuren (67) Referee: Shuhei Kubo Saturday, March 17 fixtures (GMT) Highlanders v Crusaders (06:35) Brumbies v Sharks (08:45) Stormers v Blues (13:05) Lions v Sunwolves (15:15) Jaguares v Reds (21:40) Sunday, March 18 fixtures (GMT) Waratahs v Rebels (05:05)
